title: Pathophysiology, Pharmacology and Nursing Practice I
description:
This module allows students to integrate knowledge of
pathophysiology, health assessment, principles of
medical and nursing management and pharmacology
related to cardiovascular, respiratory, endocrine, and
haematological conditions. Students will also develop
critical thinking skills through conducting health
assessments, interpreting results of diagnostic
investigations and problem-solving.
department: Alice Lee Center for Nursing Studies
faculty: Yong Loo Lin Sch of Medicine
